channel.title: Java on The Quiescent Current
channel.description: Recent content in Java on The Quiescent Current

item.title: The Turbulent History of Managed Code
item.description: Managed Code is a fascinating technology; Just-In-Time compilation provides advanced run-time optimization and strong type safety can render the hardware MMU obsolete. However the managed code renaissance is again in decline, and interestingly more than technology, business is changing the managed/native landscape. More than any other other metric, managed code is about maximizing programmer productivity.

item.title: Java 4K Contest
item.description: Crazy challenging game contest: http://javaunlimited.net/contests/java4k.php Reminds me of the winners of a 96KB contest: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.kkrieger
